description:
Workspace indicator shows the amount of opened workspaces and highlights the current one using unicode characters.

You can use it as an indicator only but widget is clickable. Left button click: move to left, right click: move right.

You can change the widgets position with preferences. The widget can be pinned to right corner (status area) default, center (data time area) and left corner (activities area).

There could be an error with the extension after update. The solution is to logout and login again.
name: Workspace indicator
